description: This Java source file defines a Spring Boot REST controller that provides basic endpoints for the notesbackend application, including welcome message, documentation redirect, health check, and application info.

classes.name: HelloController
classes.description: A REST controller exposing endpoints for greetings, documentation redirection, health check, and application info within the notesbackend project.

methods.name: hello
methods.description: Returns a welcome message indicating the application is running.

methods.name: docs
methods.description: Redirects to Swagger UI, preserving the original request scheme, host, and port.

methods.name: health
methods.description: Returns a simple 'OK' string indicating the application's health status.

methods.name: info
methods.description: Provides basic application information as a string.
